reviewText:
Absolutely fantastic.  Wish I could give it a 10.  Being from Boston helps.
All kidding aside, this is a must see.  I love the Brewster Chair story.  There is nobody better that Armand at this craft

Armand LaMontagne is an American woodworking and art hero and deserves our attention and admiration. We need more like him. As a craftsman I recomend this to all woodworkers and artists as he is as important to us as any great leader in these fields.
